snippet.title: Red Tower - Trailer Demo Release
snippet.description:
Red Tower - Trailer Demo Release

- STORY -

A long time ago, in view of the widespread chaos caused by demonic creatures, a clan was created by very powerful men: the "Umbra Sicarius" clan. They created towers scattered around the world at specific points to imprison these creatures. At one point, in the Red Tower, an unknown creature with immense power emerged, becoming a terrible threat. It was at this moment that the Guardian Responsible for Red Tower swung into action.

- WISHLIST NOW ON STEAM -
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2065280/Red_Tower/ 📌
